name: Springshot
overview:
Outsourcing. Globalization. Commoditization. The pressures facing service companies increase every day.

The work environment is changing dramatically. As industries eliminate scores of human resources and supervisory personnel to stay afloat, the top-down organization structure is reaching a breaking point. With fewer leaders to run daily operations, managers cannot adequately train and mentor frontline workers. With limited resources and support, today’s service workers have little motivation to perform.

Enter Springshot, a revolutionary workforce solution that places every worker front and center. By combining today’s leading technologies—cloud, social, mobile, and gaming—we’ve created a powerful platform that recruits, trains, directs, and motivates frontline service workers via user-friendly mobile applications.

We don’t task workers with generating “big data.” We use big data to generate meaning and mastery for frontline workers. Arm your workers with applications that advance their careers while improving your operation.

funding_rounds.source_description: Springshot raises $1.6M to turn service work into a mobile game
